A vulnerability assessments setting on Azure servers in the defined scope.

Azure REST API version: 2023-05-01. Prior API version in Azure Native 2.x: 2023-05-01.

<div><pulumi-examples>

## Example Usage

<div><pulumi-chooser type="language" options="csharp,go,typescript,python,yaml,java"></pulumi-chooser></div>


### Set a server vulnerability assessments setting of the kind settingKind on the subscription


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var azureServersSetting = new AzureNative.Security.AzureServersSetting("azureServersSetting", new()
    {
        Kind = "AzureServersSetting",
        SelectedProvider = AzureNative.Security.ServerVulnerabilityAssessmentsAzureSettingSelectedProvider.MdeTvm,
        SettingKind = "azureServersSetting",
    });

});


```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">


```go
package main

import (
	security "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native-sdk/security/v2"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := security.NewAzureServersSetting(ctx, "azureServersSetting", &security.AzureServersSettingArgs{
			Kind:             pulumi.String("AzureServersSetting"),
			SelectedProvider: pulumi.String(security.ServerVulnerabilityAssessmentsAzureSettingSelectedProviderMdeTvm),
			SettingKind:      pulumi.String("azureServersSetting"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```


</pulumi-choosable>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#selectedprovider_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">selected<wbr>Provider</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String | <a href="#servervulnerabilityassessmentsazuresettingselectedprovider">&#34;Mde<wbr>Tvm&#34;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The selected vulnerability assessments provider on Azure servers in the defined scope.</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="settingkind_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#settingkind_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">setting<wbr>Kind</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The kind of the server vulnerability assessments setting</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:security:AzureServersSetting azureServersSetting /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Security/serverVulnerabilityAssessmentsSettings/{settingKind} 
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).

	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native">Azure Native pulumi/pulumi-azure-native</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
</dl>
